modName: Kjartan - at you service. Unique voiced follower
summary: Fully voiced male Breton follower, at your service. Sex, quest and race oriented fellow to accompany you in Skyrim. If you help him just a little you will uncover his past and help him build his future. Or not, it's up to you, Dragonborn.
descriptionHtml:
[right][i]"Wow so many unique-voiced followers... female ones. I really feel like there should be at least one more. And a guy."[/i][/right][right][i]- Amczek, around December 2015

[/i][/right]
[b][center]KJARTAN VARGEN[/center][/b][img]http://i192.photobucket.com/albums/z261/Wampirencja/Kjart1.png[/img]
Fully voiced with over 1500 lines of commentary and dialogue follower. Quest, sex and race oriented male Breton follower. He has dialogue for specific locations and - huzzah - some stories and legends to tell. For sure it's for those who enjoy some talking and backstory more than do this-carry that guy. 

Our friend (or not) is equipped with one-hand sword and some spells, but he will level with PC. He will heal himself if needed and have quite a few spells in his sleeves, as a proper Breton should. 

Kjartan can be befriended after helping him find what he is looking for which comes with benefits like him talking waaay more, stories to share, tiny trinkets and - if you find yourself in need - he will romance you no matter race or sex (but it's not aimed at pure romance, so this branch can be cut off!). 
Future plans include mods patches (so he won't get quiet while exploring Summerset Isles or other DLC-sized quest-mods!).

You will find him rather bored somewhere in... you will find out. First head to Markarth. Get a drink perhaps?

[img]http://i192.photobucket.com/albums/z261/Wampirencja/Kjart3.png[/img]
This mod will give you Kjartan. And that's most important here. But also you will receive...
[b] [color=#f1c232]SMALL QUESTS [/color][/b]- because, why not? Small quests are fun. 
[b] [color=#f1c232] PLAYER HOUSE[/color][/b]- Nothing too fancy, but a non-respawning house that you can use  for free.
[b] [color=#f1c232]BONUS PET[/color][/b] inside the house. It's mostly for fun, it does tell jokes. (talk to Kjartan about it)

[b][color=#f1c232]How to recruit him? 
[/color][/b] Find a courier and listen to the cry of a lost his package. You will be able to recruit him as soon as you help courier... and maybe a little more. 

[b][color=#f1c232]Is he marriable?
[/color][/b] For the time being (as I am writing this text) - not really, no. But if there will be need I'll try to figure it out. 
[b]
[color=#f1c232]Why he doesn't look like on screens?
[/color][/b] Look for required files for him to look properly. There is also not so lore friendly eye candy version of him (or will be if I won't forget). 
I also use [b]Photoreal ENB[/b] by RaiderXGame for screens along with light and texture mods. 

[b][color=#f1c232]There are some grammar mistakes. Or spelling. Or something. [/color][/b]
English is not my first language. Not even second. I did my best, as well as a friend who helped me record all voices. WE did our best for FREE

[color=#f1c232] Bug, bug, bug, glitch....[/color]
Report it. I tried to eliminate all of them but they still could happen. [b]Some quest markers not showing up is NOT A BUG [/b](sometimes you have to look for something yourself). 
[img]http://i192.photobucket.com/albums/z261/Wampirencja/Kjart2.png[/img]
[color=#f1c232][size=4]  DLCs needed[/size][/color]
 I used all of them, so have Dragonborn and Dawnguard at your side. Probably Hearthfire too. 

[color=#f1c232][size=4] Cosmetics[/size][/color]
*you can skip them if you want but he won't look like on screens
*I offer also Apachii-less version of Kjartan if you don't want "a lot of hair in your Kjartan" mod to skip those completely. 

[color=#ffffff]1. Apachii Sky Hair *10000% needed if you want ApachiiHair version*[/color]
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?

[color=#ffffff]2. Better Males - download "[i][b]Genox Better Males + younger faces"  [/b][/i][/color]
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2488/?

[color=#f4f4f4]3. Fine Face Textures for males [/color]
 http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27815/?

[color=#f1c232][size=3] Apart from those listed in Requirements you would like to have (used on screens)...[/size][/color]
[b] [/b][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/39983/?][Regal Huntsman armor][/url] [/b][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50483/?][[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50483/?]Photoreal ENB][/url][/b]

[color=#bf9000][size=3][b][center]>>RACEMENU WAS USED DURING CREATION OF CHARACTER<<[/center][/b][/size][/color][color=#bf9000][size=3][b][center][/center][/b][/size][/color][left] [img]http://i192.photobucket.com/albums/z261/Wampirencja/Kjart7.png[/img]
#1 [b]Kjartan Follower 1.0[/b]  or [b]Kjartan Follower 1.0 Vanilla[/b]
Just drop files into your Skyrim/Data folder or use NMM. 

#2 Not-so-lore-friendly eye candy
Download #1 first. 
Drop both "meshes" and "textures" into your Skyrim/Data folder. Overwrite when asked.  



[img]http://i192.photobucket.com/albums/z261/Wampirencja/Kjart6.png[/img]
      This mod probably will have some issues with mods that edit some Wilderness cells (3 27/ -24 10 / -14,26 / 13,25 ). 
Tested with SKSE, EFF and many, many, many more mods. My load order with mods used to test it will be in commentaries *sticky post*
[img]http://i192.photobucket.com/albums/z261/Wampirencja/Kjart4.png[/img]
Those are included in the mod, [u]you don't have to download them again[/u]. 

[color=#f1c232] Open Books by stoverjm[/color]
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/42362/?

http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53767/?[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50483/?]


[/url][/left][left][img]http://i192.photobucket.com/albums/z261/Wampirencja/Kjart5.png[/img]

author: Amczek
